segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, it’s like she’s in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s just standing there, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she hasn’t even turned around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, so innocent and hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so chaotic, but everyone seems calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t noticed anything yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting closer to the children, and they don’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is just so strange and unpredictable.
segments.speaker: PAR
